svcproc.title: TV/VCR WIRING
svcproc.para:
Refer to circuit diagram on
for the following discussion. This system includes an ON/OFF switch (590) and separate power source connectors for TV (608) and VCR (607).
The TV/VCR ON/OFF switch contains an LED to illuminate the switch label, that is powered when the key switch is in the ON or ACC position (power to the LED is from the auxiliary bunk blower relay).

ON/OFF switch terminal five receives battery power (key ON or OFF) from B2 battery stud through 30A fuse F10-B (located in cab) and sleeper 15A fuse 582-A. Switch terminal 6 delivers the power to the power source connectors. The power source switch LED and power source connectors are grounded through the sleeper and cab harness to cab ground adapter (454).
